author: SimpleNexus, LLC
title: SimpleNexus Mobile Mortgage Platform successfully completes
text:
DRAPER, Utah , Sept. 2,   SimpleNexus, LLC, Mobile Mortgage Platform announced it successfully completed the Service Organization Control 2 Examination on August 8 of this year. This security audit measured processing integrity, availability, confidentiality controls and overall security of an organization. The mobile mortgage platform successfully demonstrated its ability to comply with all of the American Institute of Certified Public Accountants' applicable Trust Service Principles and Criteria. The SOC2 report evaluates and plays a role in overseeing vendor management programs, internal corporate governance, risk management processes and regulatory oversight.
Customers of SimpleNexus can rest assured their partnership with the company can be trusted. In addition, clients know the proper controls have been implemented to keep their clients' personal information and data secure.
"Security is more critical than ever. Getting the SOC2 audit completed shows our clients that we're in it for the long haul," noted Dave Stevenson , CTO of SimpleNexus.
The company reported they will complete their Type II later this year. The Type II report will evaluate the policies and procedures over an extended period of time.
Following the second audit, SimpleNexus will have an examination performed annually. This practice will ensure the mobile mortgage platform provider will continue to adhere to guidelines and ensure data and information security of all customers.
Data and information security should be a priority for all companies, especially those providing mortgage apps for loan officers. The important documents and information shared on the mobile platform should be well-protected. Any risk of this information being compromised threatens not only the integrity of the company but also the security of the customers using the application.
SimpleNexus prides itself in providing peace of mind and optimal security to all users and customers who work with the company. It strives for excellence by passing and continuing to evaluate its current security and processing integrity through additional evaluations and audits on a yearly basis.
Customers using a mobile mortgage platform through SimpleNexus can rest assured they will continue to receive service from an operation that constantly works toward exceptional security and overall improvement.
About SimpleNexus 
Draper, Utah -based SimpleNexus is an award-winning mobile platform provider for the mortgage industry. With more than 4,000 loan originators nationwide, and 70 enterprise accounts, SimpleNexus helps capture new leads, convert those leads into loans, and process the loans more quickly utilizing mobile technologies.
